```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(rio)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
theme_set(theme_minimal())
opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
               fig.width = 6.5,
               fig.height = 8)
```

```{r load-data, include=FALSE}
tweets <- import(here("data", "rstats_tweets.rds"),
               setclass = "tbl_df") 

head(tweets)

```

```{r commit2}
#install.packages("forcats")
library(forcats)

commit2_filter <- tweets %>% count(screen_name) %>% arrange(desc(n)) %>% slice(1:25) %>% mutate(screen_name = fct_reorder(screen_name, n))

commit2_graph <- ggplot(data=commit2_filter, aes(x=screen_name, y=n)) +
 geom_bar(stat="identity") +
  coord_flip() + theme_gray()
```
